comment.author: 10799299@N00
comment._content: Jue Quon Tai was a Chinese-American vaudeville performer. Here's a really interesting blog post about her softfilm.blogspot.com/2009/08/jue-quon-tai-chinese-prince...

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Here are the links I put on the other photo (including the one j3net has above): Lots about vaudeville singer Jue Quon Tai: softfilm.blogspot.com/2009/08/jue-quon-tai-chinese-prince... softfilm.blogspot.com/2009/08/jue-quon-tai-on-stage-door-... softfilm.blogspot.com/2010/07/jue-quon-tai-pretty-and-pan... Also mentioned here: www.sscnet.ucla.edu/history/faculty/henryyu/APACHP/teache... She married director Harry Lachman in France, 1938; lived in Beverly Hills; was widowed in 1975, and died in 1991. www.imdb.com/name/nm0480046/bio
